rows.label: qst100806_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! It's rare to meet people
in a place like this, isn't
it, Kapha! ...Huh?

rows.label: qst100806_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh! I was so focused on
finding the Healing Herb
that I forgot about Kapha.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0003
rows.name:
If he's so worried about me,
he should come himself.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0004
rows.name: He's not bad at fighting, but...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0005
rows.name:
That's right! His movements
are so precise! But he's
terrible at climbing mountains!

rows.label: qst100806_msg0006
rows.name: The complete opposite of me... Oh!!

rows.label: qst100806_msg0007
rows.name:
I found the Healing Herb! In
the grass right over there!

rows.label: qst100806_msg0008
rows.name:
You see, the Healing Herb sprouts
in the morning, grows, and then
withers as soon as it becomes noon.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0009
rows.name:
"Why don't you just wake
up early and pick it?"
you're probably thinking.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, the worst part is, monsters
come to eat the Healing Herb...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0011
rows.name:
I'm not good at fighting, so
I want Kapha to come, but...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0012
rows.name:
Since you're the ones he
asked, it's useless to wait!

rows.label: qst100806_msg0013
rows.name:
I'm nervous about fighting alone,
but... it can't be helped.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0014
rows.name: You'll go and pick it for me?

rows.label: qst100806_msg0015
rows.name:
But since I've come this far,
I want to pick it myself...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0016
rows.name:
You see, instead of fighting, I
can just slip past the monsters'
feet and pick the Healing Herb...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0017
rows.name: Mmm...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0018
rows.name:
A Driver with strong-looking Blades
is telling me not to, huh...

rows.label: qst100806_msg0019
rows.name:
I understand. I'd just be a burden
if I were there, so I'll go back.

rows.label: qst100806_msg0020
rows.name:
The Healing Herb...
I'm counting on you!
